task.title: Reloading T24 Binaries
task.shortdesc: Upgrading T24 binaries with new version.

taskbody.prereq: You must have received a valid ZIP file containing the new t24-binaries version called as: "t24-binaries*.zip"
taskbody.context: At any time, you can upgrade the t24-binaries without reinstalling Design Studio.

step.cmd: Copy the t24-binaries ZIP file in the Design Studio installation folder.

step.stepresult: Design Studio detects the ZIP file and opens a dialog box asking if you want to install the new zip.

step.cmd: Click on Yes if you agree.

taskbody.result: New zip is extracted in t24-binaries folder, overriding the previous version. No DS restart is required to start working. The zip file is renamed *.backup. Next DS restart won't replay this task.
